    • isBetween

      public boolean isBetween​(LocalDate date)
      + This method is use to help find if a meeting is occurring on a specific date. It return true if the date is between the starting and ending date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date that the user wish to find if it is between the starting and ending date
      Returns:
      true if the parameter is between the starting and ending date or on those date

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(Appointment o)
      + The compareTo method is used to compare appointment. It first use the start date to compare, then the end date and finally the description to compare appointments.
